text: Halfway Island is the name of several places: *Halfway Island (Palmer Archipelago) an island in the Palmer Archipelago, Antarctica *Halfway Island, one of several islands in Canada *Halfway Island, an island off the east coast of Queensland, Australia *Halfway Island, a place (or maybe an island) in Alaska, United States *Halfway Island, an island in Hammond, NY United States ==See also== * Halfway Islet - an island that is part of the Great Barrier Reef
title: Halfway Island
